deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring Velux using YAML is being removed but there was an connection error importing your YAML configuration.

Make sure your home assistant can reach the KLF 200.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The Velux YAML configuration import cannot connect to server

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring Velux using YAML is being removed but there was an unknown error importing your YAML configuration.

Check your configuration or have a look at the documentation of the integration.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: The Velux YAML configuration import failed with unknown error raised by pyvlx
